data.description: Join Our Team as a Summer 2026 AI Intern About the Role Are you ready to gain hands-on experience and make a real impact? Weatherford is seeking a motivated AI Intern for Summer 2026 at our Houston location. As an AI Intern, you will gain exposure to real-world applications of artificial intelligence, data analysis, and automation within a global energy organization. This internship is designed to help you grow both personally and professionally while providing insight into the oil and gas industry and Weatherford’s role in driving innovation through technology. What You’ll Do - Receive coaching and mentoring to understand Weatherford’s organization, systems, and AI-related initiatives. - Support internal projects focused on artificial intelligence, automation, data-driven decision-making, and process improvement. - Assist with developing, testing, or analyzing AI, machine learning, or data-related solutions. - Collaborate with cross-functional teams including IT, Engineerin...
